passwords_not_the_same: Your password and confirm password does not match
request_pass_reset_title: If you've forgotten your password you can enter your e-mail or username and we'll send out instructions on how to reset it.
confirm_pass_reset_title: Fill the form to complete your password reset request.
failed_reset_pass: Something went wrong with reseting your password... Refresh page and try again
get_started_subtitle: Follow the two simple steps and enjoy FIFATracker!
get_started_step1: 1. Register an new account or login. It's completely free!
get_started_step2: 2. Upload* your CM game save, or input data manually here.
get_started_step2_explain: *Only PC users can upload their game saves
success_activate_msg: Your account has been activated, you can login now.
failed_activate_msg: Something went wrong with activating your account....
